explains: v. 引用，援引；引证，引以为例；传唤，传讯；嘉奖，表彰
wordGroup: cite an example 举例；引用一个例子

sentences.en: Can you cite another case like this?
sentences.cn: 你能举另外一个像这样的实例吗？

sentences.en: The officials didn't cite particular reports.
sentences.cn: 官员们没有引用特定的报道。

sentences.en: It would be an endless task to cite such living examples.
